The resident's invocations for the trave.ARABIC_TEXT: (( أَسْتَوْدِعُ اللَّهَ دِينَكَ، وَأَمَانَتَكَ، وَخَوَاتِيمَ عَمَلِكَ)).
The resident's invocations for the trave.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (I place your religion, your faithfulness and the ends of your deeds in the trust of Allah.)

The resident's invocations for the trave.ARABIC_TEXT: ((زَوَّدَكَ اللَّهُ التَّقْوَى، وَغَفَرَ ذَنْبَكَ، وَيَسَّرَ لَكَ الخَيْرَ حَيْثُ ما كُنْتَ)).
The resident's invocations for the trave.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Zawwadakal-lahut-taqwa, waghafara thanbak, wayassara lakal-khayra haythuma kunt.)
The resident's invocations for the trave.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (May Allah endow you with taqwa, forgive your sins and facilitate all good for you, wherever you be.)(taqwa: a comprehensive term which refers to all good actions and obedience i.e. performing the commanded actions and avoiding the prohibited actions.)
